project_title: RegFlowAI – Regulatory Capital Automation under Basel III/IV
project_description:
AI-driven RegTech solution automating Basel III/IV capital computation and risk reporting.

Designed a compliance engine translating Basel III/IV and SA-CCR/FRTB frameworks into structured business logic and capital models.
Built an automated computation layer for EAD, RWA, and capital ratios with integrated stress testing and validation.
Implemented data lineage and audit-ready controls, ensuring transparent regulatory traceability.
Reduced manual compliance effort by 40% through rule-driven automation and risk model standardization.
Demonstrated advanced RegTech, financial analytics, and data governance expertise.
project_tags: Python, Pandas, Financial Modeling, Risk Analytics, Basel Frameworks

project_title: Dublin Rent Intelligence – Predictive Housing Analytics
project_description:
Machine-learning model forecasting Dublin housing rental trends for market insights.

Developed a regression-based predictive analytics model using multi-source housing data.
Engineered features and applied normalization to enhance prediction reliability and variance control.
Created geospatial dashboards visualizing affordability zones and rental hotspots.
Automated data extraction and model retraining pipelines to maintain live accuracy.
Applied urban analytics and predictive modeling for real-estate decision intelligence.
project_tags: Python, Scikit-learn, Geopandas, Regression Modeling, Power BI

project_title: Coffee Shop 360 – Process Optimization & Cost Reduction
project_description:
End-to-end business intelligence project using process mining and predictive analytics.

Conducted Celonis process mining to identify workflow bottlenecks across order handling, logistics, and staffing.
Built a Linear Programming optimization model reducing courier cost by 30% and delivery cycle time by 12 minutes.
Designed KPI dashboards for operational efficiency and service throughput tracking.
Applied prescriptive analytics to align scheduling, resource allocation, and customer satisfaction.
Demonstrated mastery of process mining, BI visualization, and decision analytics.
project_tags: Celonis, Linear Programming, Power BI, Python, Optimization

project_title: Data Quality Ops – Automated Cleaning Framework (KNIME + Python)
project_description:
Data governance pipeline standardizing preprocessing, quality checks, and schema validation.

Developed a modular KNIME-based ETL pipeline automating missing value handling, normalization, and categorical standardization.
Integrated Python scripts for validation, duplicate removal, and type consistency enforcement.
Reduced preprocessing time by 85% and improved data integrity by 82%.
Delivered governance-ready documentation supporting repeatable, auditable workflows.
Showcased strong data engineering, governance, and process automation capability.
project_tags: KNIME, Python, ETL, Data Validation, Data Governance

project_title: Ecoshop Analytics – Sustainability & Consumer Insight Platform
project_description:
Full-stack sustainability analytics prototype promoting eco-friendly consumer decisions.

Built a data-driven e-commerce analytics platform integrating CO₂ tracking and behavioral segmentation.
Applied predictive modeling to identify sustainability-focused consumer segments.
Designed Power BI dashboards quantifying carbon impact, purchase trends, and eco-product performance.
Conducted A/B testing for UX and conversion optimization of sustainable product recommendations.
Illustrated application of data analytics and behavioral economics in green commerce.
project_tags: Power BI, Predictive Modeling, UX Testing, SQL, Sustainability Analytics

project_title: Airbnb Demand Forecasting – Market Dynamics & Pricing Analytics
project_description:
Predictive model for Airbnb occupancy and pricing optimization using regression and BI visualization.

Built a machine-learning regression model to forecast occupancy and price elasticity.
Conducted EDA and clustering to isolate key demand drivers including seasonality, amenities, and geography.
Optimized accuracy via feature engineering and hyperparameter tuning.
Developed Power BI dashboards translating model outcomes into actionable pricing insights.
Demonstrated market analytics and data storytelling for travel and hospitality.
project_tags: Python, Power BI, Feature Engineering, Clustering, Regression Analysis

project_title: Visual Analytics for Decision Making – Titanic Case Study
project_description:
Data visualization experiment showing how chart design influences executive decision-making.

Compared multiple visualization techniques (bar, violin, heatmap) to test analytical bias.
Created interactive dashboards visualizing passenger survival data by class, age, and title.
Highlighted the role of visual cognition in business storytelling and interpretation.
Built decision-impact guidelines improving data presentation in analytics reports.
Reinforced expertise in data visualization, interpretation, and communication strategy.
project_tags: Power BI, Tableau, Python, Statistics, Data Visualization

project_title: Rethinking COVID Metrics – Ethical Analytics and Normalization
project_description:
Data normalization and ethics project addressing misinterpretation of per-capita pandemic metrics.

Built a statistical normalization framework correcting for population density and testing bias.
Conducted comparative time-series analytics across regions to uncover misrepresented trends.
Created interactive dashboards for data transparency and public reporting.
Advocated responsible data communication to improve policy-level analytics.
Demonstrated ethical analytics and bias mitigation in data interpretation.
project_tags: Python, Time Series, Data Ethics, Visualization, Public Analytics
